mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: WithU is dedicated to creating a safer world for the deaf and hard-of-hearing community. We believe everyone deserves to be aware of emergency situations and have the tools to respond appropriately.

soundDetection.title: Real-time Sound Detection
soundDetection.description: Advanced AI-powered detection of emergency sounds including fire alarms, smoke detectors, and sirens.

accessibility.title: Accessibility First
accessibility.description: Designed specifically for the deaf and hard-of-hearing community with visual and haptic alerts.

statusSharing.title: Status Sharing
statusSharing.description: Let others know your safety status during emergencies with customizable messages.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-language Support
multiLanguage.description: Available in English, Turkish, and Arabic with more languages coming soon.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.subtitle: Your Privacy is Protected
privacy.description: All audio processing happens locally on your device. No sound data is ever transmitted, stored, or shared with external servers. Your privacy and security are our top priorities.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: WithU uses advanced Web Audio API and machine learning algorithms to detect emergency sounds in real-time. The app is built with React Native and Expo, ensuring cross-platform compatibility and optimal performance.

support.title: Support & Feedback
support.subtitle: Need Help?
support.description: We're here to help! If you have questions, feedback, or need assistance, please reach out to our support team.

acknowledgments.title: Acknowledgments
acknowledgments.description: Special thanks to the deaf and hard-of-hearing community for their invaluable feedback and insights that made this app possible. WithU is built with love and dedication to serve those who need it most.

rating.title: Enjoying WithU?
rating.description: Your feedback helps us improve and reach more people who need emergency sound detection.

footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ for the deaf and hard-of-hearing community
